info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 2:31PM CDT until May 1 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Little River near Sasakwa affecting Seminole and Hughes Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little River near Sasakwa.
* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flood depths to about 1 foot of croplands and pastures along the Little River extending from near the State Highway 99 bridge to north of Sasakwa in Seminole County... to the confluence with the Canadian River in Hughes County. Floodwaters cover State Highway 99 near the river and south of Bowlegs.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 27.3 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH
